item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Love is the longing for the half of ourselves we have lost." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "We can never know what to want, because, living only one life, we can neither compare it with our previous lives nor perfect it in our lives to come." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "When the heart speaks, the mind finds it indecent to object." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Perhaps the reason we are unable to love is that we yearn to be loved, that is, we demand something (love) from our partner instead of delivering ourselves up to him demand-free and asking for nothing but his company." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "I want you to be weak. As weak as I am." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "she loved to walk down the street with a book under her arm. It had the same significance for her as an elegant cane for the dandy a century ago. It differentiated her from others." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "A person who longs to leave the place where he lives is an unhappy person." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "The only relationship that can make both partners happy is one in which sentimentality has no place and neither partner makes any claim on the life and freedom of the other." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "The worth of a human being lies in the ability to extend oneself, to go outside oneself, to exist in and for other people." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "To laugh is to live profoundly." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "To rebel against being born a woman seemed as foolish to her as to take pride in it." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "The emotion of love gives all of us a misleading illusion of knowing the other." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We have to continually be jumping off cliffs and developing our wings on the way down." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Rana add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Everything was beautiful and nothing hurt." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Rana add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Rana add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut, Jr
item.description: "Dear future generations: Please accept our apologies. We were rolling drunk on petroleum." -- Kurt Vonnegut, Jr

item.title: Rana add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Hello babies. Welcome to Earth. It's hot in the summer and cold in the winter. It's round and wet and crowded. On the outside, babies, you've got a hundred years here. There's only one rule that I know of, babies-"God damn it, you've got to be kind." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Rana add a quote by Richard Leigh
item.description: "You’ve got to sing like you don’t need the money, Love like you’ll never get hurt. You’ve got to dance like nobody’s watchin’." -- Richard Leigh

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Oh lovers! be careful in those dangerous first days! once you've brought breakfast in bed you'll have to bring it forever, unless you want to be accused of lovelessness and betrayal." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description:
"She had an overwhelming desire to tell him, like the most banal of women. Don't let me go, hold me tight, make me your plaything, your slave, be strong! But they were words she could not say.
The only thing she said when he released her from his embrace was, "You don't know how happy I am to be with you." That was the most her reserved nature allowed her to express." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "There is no perfection only life" -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Human life occurs only once, and the reason we cannot determine which of our decisions are good and which bad is that in a given situation we can make only one decision; we are not granted a second, third, or fourth life in which to compare various decisions." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Only the most naive of questions are truly serious." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "What does it mean to live in truth? Putting it negatively is easy enough: it means not lying, not hiding, and not dissimulating." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Rana add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others." -- George Orwell

item.title: Rana add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "Perhaps one did not want to be loved so much as to be understood." -- George Orwell

item.title: Rana add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "If you want a picture of the future, imagine a boot stamping on a human face—for ever." -- George Orwell

item.title: Rana add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "We shall meet in the place where there is no darkness." -- George Orwell

item.title: Rana add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "Doublethink means the power of holding two contradictory beliefs in one's mind simultaneously, and accepting both of them." -- George Orwell
